Star Wars is an ongoing Star Wars comic series published by Marvel Comics between January 1, 2020 and September 11, 2024. Written by Charles Soule, it is set between the 1980 film The Empire Strikes Back and the 1983 film Return Of The Jedi. It's a follow-up to the 2015 series of the same name.
